description: This table is for periods/groups of sig lines for multiline sigs.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: MLSIG_L1_INTERIOR_LINKAGE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The linkage type category ID for the order record which describes the relationship between multiple sets of medication instructions for specified periods of time.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


THEN


AND


OR


TO


NOT

columns.name: MLSIG_L1_DURATION
columns.description: Duration in days of one period for a medication with differing dosage instructions for specified periods of time.
